name: Transform any document in Monday in XLSX/CSV
description:
Extract Key Information from Files Stored in Monday.com with Koncile OCR

Automatically process documents stored in your Monday.com boards using Koncile’s powerful OCR engine.

Monitor items or file columns for new attachments such as PDFs or images.

Send files directly to Koncile OCR and extract only the data you need — invoice numbers, dates, amounts, clauses, and more.

Get back clean, structured data, ready to be used in Monday.com or exported to other systems (CSV, Excel, APIs, etc.).
